intro: Columnea ornata, commonly known as the silverleaf columnea, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its trailing growth habit and showy, tubular flowers. Columnea ornata is often cultivated as a houseplant or in hanging baskets due to its attractive appearance and relatively easy care requirements.
